name: Mobile Dreams
description: Mobile Dreams Factory (“MDF”) is an end to end mobility consultancy firm with a huge focus on mobile strategy, product and service design, execution, customer acquisition and product evolution. They help companies to accelerate and connect with its business through mobile transformation. Mobile Dreams has designed and built mobile strategies, services and products for companies such as IKEA, Inditex, Coca-Cola, Burger King, Vodafone, Banco de Santander, etc.
